title: pADum paNiyE paNi
sahitya:
pADum paNiyE paNi (murugA unai) unai pagharvadum purivadum bhava piNi enrariya


anupallavi

  tEDum tuNaiyAgi jnAna teLivAgi kUDi enai aruL kumarA guruparA guhA unaip-


caraNam    vAnmarai inburum sUriyan nAvinai mAmayil Eriya vanna ponnE ninai
dInarai kAttiDum sErvizhil karuNaiyai tIyarai mAittiDum tIdiDum vElinil shentamizh
